Wnioski uytkownika w zakresie dochodzenia jego praw dotyczcych ochrony danych i nasze odpowiedzi na takie wniosku bd przechowywane w celach dokumentacyjnych przez okres do trzech lat, a w szczeglnych przypadkach przez czas duszy, w celu umoliwienia dochodzenia, korzystania lub obrony w zakresie roszcze prawnych.

Podstaw prawn stanowi art. 6(1)(f) RODO, w oparciu o nasz interes w zakresie obrony przed roszczeniami cywilnymi zgodnie z art. 82 RODO, uniknicia grzywny zgodnie z art. 83 RODO oraz realizowania naszych zobowiza w zakresie odpowiedzialnoci na podstawie art. 5(2) RODO.

Uytkownik moe skontaktowa si z naszym inspektorem ochrony danych pod adresem dpo@tier.app lub pod powyszym adresem korespondencyjnym (Do rk: Inspektor ochrony danych).  Wyranie informujemy, e w przypadku skorzystania z adresu e-mail tre wiadomoci nie zostanie odnotowana wycznie przez naszego inspektora ochrony danych. Jeeli zatem uytkownik jest zainteresowany przekazaniem informacji poufnych, w pierwszej kolejnoci powinien skontaktowa si z nami bezporednio, korzystajc z tego adresu e-mail.

Uytkownik ma prawo do wniesienia skargi do organu nadzorczego do spraw ochrony danych.

10. Zmiany w niniejszym Owiadczeniu o ochronie danych

Okresowo wprowadzamy zmiany w niniejszym Owiadczeniu o ochronie danych, aby zapewni, e jego tre stale odzwierciedla aktualny stan wymogw prawnych i faktycznych okolicznoci (np. przy wprowadzaniu nowych usug lub funkcji). Rekomendujemy regularne sprawdzanie niniejszego Owiadczenia o ochronie danych pod ktem ewentualnych zmian.

Ostatnia aktualizacja: 2022-05-13

Qatar

PRIVACY NOTICE

Last update: 08.03.2021

The responsible authority and service provider is:

TIER Doha LLC, QFC No. 01173 (TIER, we)

Email: privacy@tier.app

TIER Data Protection Officer:

dpo@tier.app

The protection of personal data and hence your privacy is of utmost importance to us and taken very seriously. The following privacy notice informs you about the collection and processing of your data when using the TIER service and the TIER website. 

Our privacy notice does not apply to your activities on the websites of social networks or other providers that can be reached via the links on our website. Please check the data protection regulations on the respective websites of these providers.

  1. General information about the collection and processing of your personal data

1.1 Personal data

We collect and use your personal data only insofar as necessary to deploy a fully functional website as well as our contents and services. Personal data are information that is associated with you as an individual. Examples are your name, address, postal address, phone number or email address. Non-personal data are information such as the number of users of a website or aggregated movement data, as they can no longer be traced to a certain individual.

1.2 Processing of personal data

Processing is any process in connection with personal data, carried out with or without the help of automated procedures, such as collecting, recording, organising, sorting, storing, adapting or changing, reading, retrieving, using, disclosing through transferring, processing or another form of provision, synchronising or connecting, restricting, deleting or destroying. Personal data will be collected via our apps or website if you make them available on your own initiative, e.g. by registrations, completing forms, by sending emails, or by booking a TIER vehicle. We will use the data for the appropriate purposes or purposes resulting from the request, such as the booking inquiry for processing your booking request. A transmission to third parties will only be performed if this is explicitly permitted by law or if you agreed to the transfer as part of your registration or during an active business relationship. We will inform you by email to which third parties, other than those expressly set out in this Privacy Notice, your personal data will be transferred to. 

1.3 Legal bases of the processing

The collection and use of personal data of our users only happens with informed consent of the user, and in accordance with Qatari Law no. 13 of 2016 concerning the Protection of Personal Data (the Data Protection Law) and the GDPR. Insofar we seek consent for the processing operations of personal data of the person concerned, Art. 3 and 4 of the Data Protection Law, and Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR serve as legal basis for the processing of personal data. An exception is made in such cases in which a prior consent is for factual reasons not possible and the processing of the data is permitted by law. For the processing of personal data for the purpose of the preparation or conclusion of a contract with you, Art. 10 of the Data Protection Law and Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR serve as legal basis. This also applies to processing operations that are required for the execution of pre-contract measures. Insofar the processing of personal data is necessary for compliance with a legal obligation to which the controller is subject, Art. 4 of the Data Protection Law and Art. 6(1)(c) GDPR serve as legal basis. In case the processing is necessary to protect the vital interests of our company or a third person and the interests, fundamental rights and freedoms do not override the former interest, Art. 4 of the Data Protection Law and Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR serve as legal basis for the processing. The retention of the functionality of our IT systems, the marketing of our own products and services and the legal measures of documenting business contacts are such legitimate interests.

1.4 Safety

We implement technical and organisational security measures to protect your data that we hold against manipulation, loss, destruction and against access by unauthorised persons. We continually improve our security measures in line with technological development.

1.5 Deleting your personal data

The personal data processed by us will be deleted or restricted according to Art. 5(3) of the Data Protection Law and Art. 17 and 18 GDPR. Unless clearly indicated in this privacy notice, all data currently stored with us will be deleted, as soon as they are no longer necessary for their purpose or as long as there are no legal obligations for us to retain them. If the data is not deleted because they are legally required, their processing will be restricted, i.e. the data will be blocked and not processed for other purposes. This applies for example to data that have to be retained for business or taxation reasons.

  1. Data collection during the use of TIER services

On our website and in our applications, we enable our users to register themselves by indicating personal data. The registration is mandatory for the use of the TIER services.

2.1 Data collection and permissions when using the TIER app

All data we can access within the context of the permissions will be used only for the purposes indicated in this privacy notice. We do not collect any data that are used for other purposes than the ones mentioned in this data policy.

Camra 

You may rent a scooter by scanning its QR code, and for that we will ask access to your camera. You may also rent a scooter in other ways which do not require access to your camera, such as by typing the number under the scooter's QR code on the app, or selecting a nearby scooter directly on the app.

Access to your camera is necessary to verify your drivers license and identity, as we are legally obligated to do so. See section 6, Drivers License Verification for E-Moped Customers for further information about the verification of your identity and drivers license.

Localisation 

We need information about your location to show you on Google Maps (Google Ireland Limited) and Apple Maps (Apple Inc.) whether you are near a vehicle and how you can get there. See the next section Data collection when renting a TIER vehicle for more information about data processing of Google Maps and Apple Maps.

2.2 TIER analytics

We would like to understand the usage behaviour of our app to be able to improve our service continuously. For this purpose, we collect the data in aggregate form, i.e. connected: Device information (e.g. Information about the operating system and the app version), the point in time when you open the TIER app, your behaviour in the app (e.g. the selection of vehicles), the duration of use or the time spent in certain functionalities.

Adjust

To optimize our marketing activities, we commission the service provider Adjust (Adjust GmbH, Saarbrcker Str. 37A, 10405 Berlin). The data collected by Adjust provide insights into e.g. the download of the TIER app, the online advertising channel that was used to generate the download, the point in time when the app was opened, the duration of app usage and particularly used app functions (especially about the successful login and completed rides). Adjust uses IP and Mac addresses of the users for the analysis. They will be hashed after the collection and used by Adjust only in pseudonymised form.

2.3 Data collection when renting a TIER vehicle

Google Maps

The website and the TIER apps use Google Maps API applications. They enable us to show e.g. Interactive maps on our website or in our apps. This application is crucial for the functioning and the full availability of our contents and services. Here you can find the Google Terms of Use. Additional Terms of Use for Google Maps / Google Earth can be found here. Here you can find the Google Privacy Policy. Besides showing available vehicles, we use Google Maps to translate geo positions into addresses and indicate the approximate walking distance to the selected vehicle.

2.3.2 Telematics units

To be able to see and book the TIER vehicles on the map, we use IoT boxes and telematics units in our vehicles. They send GPS data on a regular basis. Our service provider cannot allocate the data sent to you. The reconstruction of the location of the rented vehicle based on the GPS data sent takes only place in the following cases and for the following purposes:

  • Through geofencing, a warning will be issued when the circulation zone is left or the booking is terminated outside the area of use. According to the General Terms, a vehicle can only circulate within the circulation zone and the booking can only be terminated within our area of use (Art. (6)(1)(f) GDPR). You can see the circulation zone of the place where you are located in the TIER app at any time.
  • This applies also for the termination of the rent not carried out by the user, e.g. after an unusually long rental period, in your and our interest (Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR), or
  • As part of service requests during the usage (e.g. booking cannot be terminated, vehicle cannot be found, assistance in case of an accident) (Art. 6(1)(b) and (f) GDPR).
  • Proof in case of damage: In case of an accident or another case of damage, such as the damage of the vehicle, we have a legitimate interest to prove where the accident in case of damage happened (Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR).
  • Transparent billing: After the rent was terminated, you will receive an overview of the rent in your app and optionally by email. We indicate the start and end point of your rides as well as parking locations (if applicable) in your booking history (Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR).
  • Improvement of availability: anonymous evaluation of places where the users already performed bookings in order to optimize the distribution of the vehicles. (Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR).

2.4 Data collection during contacting

In case you contact us via the contact form, email or phone, we will process the information you give us for the purpose of processing your request as well as for possible follow-up questions. The processing is based on our legitimate interest to be able to answer customer requests. Your data will be deleted as soon as they are no longer required for the purpose of the request or the fulfillment of legal obligations.

  1. Cookies

What are cookies?

Cookies are text files placed on your computer to collect standard internet log information and visitor behaviour information. Cookies cannot be used to start programs or place viruses on a computer. By means of the information contained in the cookies, we can improve the navigation and enable the correct display of our website. In no event we will pass on the processed data to third persons or connect them with other personal data without your prior consent.

What types of cookies do we use?

  • Necessary TIER uses these cookies to remember your cookie preferences (set on our cookie banner) and to maintain security measures.
  • Functionality TIER uses these cookies so that we recognise you on our website and remember your previously selected preferences. These could include what language you prefer and location you are in.
  • Advertising TIER uses these cookies to collect information about your visit to our website, the content you viewed, the links you followed and information about your browser, device, and your IP address. TIER sometimes shares some limited aspects of this data with third parties for advertising purposes. We may also share online data collected through cookies with our advertising partners. This means that when you visit another website, you may be shown advertising based on your browsing patterns on our website.

Cookie banner - how to manage cookies

By setting your preferences using our cookie banner, you may choose which cookies you would like us to place on your computer. You may accept all cookies, reject all cookies (except for necessary cookies), or granularly accept only chosen categories of cookies by clicking on "adjust cookie settings" and enabling or disabling the respective toggles.

  1. Transferring personal data to third parties

Besides the service providers mentioned under point 2 and 3 above, we involved processors for the following processing operations:

  • providers of information society services, such as web server, email server, storage server, cloud management systems, geolocation systems, cloud storage.
  • marketing service providers
  • email service providers
  • payment system providers
  • providers of incident management systems
  • Furthermore we may transfer your personal data to the following recipients:
  • companies of the TIER group
  • government authorities and / or public administrations
  • banks and financial institutions for the collection of the services
  • state security forces and institutions according to the provisions of the law

Your data is only passed on to third parties wherever permissible and required by the Data Protection Law and the European data protection. This is the case if you expressly consent to the transfer of your data to one of our cooperation partners and / or the transfer is necessary for the performance of the contract. Furthermore, a transfer is legal from a data protection perspective if it is required for the enforcement of other regulations (e.g. criminal law provisions) and the transfer is allowed from a data protection point of view. Aggregated and anonymous data about routes are furthermore provided to public facilities, such as research centers, cities and municipalities for the purpose of improving the local traffic situation. Individual persons can no longer be derived from these aggregated data. Insofar as we pass on data to recipients located outside the European Economic Area or the State of Qatar, we ensure that the recipient provides either an adequate level of data privacy protection (e.g. due to an adequacy decision of the EU commission for the respective country or the agreement of EU Standard Contractual Clauses with the recipient) and in accordance with Art. 15 of the Data Protection Law, or we have your consent for the transfer.

  1. Drivers license verification for e-moped customers

We need to verify your drivers license and your identity before you can rent TIER e-mopeds. We use an automated verification process that works as follows:

  • Step 1: Verification of the drivers license. You are asked to take front and back pictures of your drivers license with your smartphone camera. The app automatically checks if the license is valid, unexpired and government-issued based on the pictures and the data included in the pictures (usually name, birthday, license number, issuing country, expiration date, issue date, license classes). Instructional permits, learners permits, provisional / probationary licenses and junior licenses are not accepted. Photocopied and temporary licenses are not accepted. Licenses without photographs of the driver may warrant the request of additional legal identity documents.
  • Step 2: Identity verification. You are asked to use the TIER app to take a picture of your face with your smartphone camera. The app compares the camera picture with the photo on the drivers license. To do this, you must look into your camera and the app takes a series of pictures. Thereafter, the app will automatically select and store the good quality images. The remaining images are discarded. After that, the app compares the images with the drivers license. It does this by calculating a value based on biometric algorithms. If this value exceeds a defined threshold, the identity verification is considered successful.
  • Step 3: Liveness verification. The app also checks whether it is a live person performing the identification. To do this, you must turn his head to the left and to the right. The app takes a series of images and creates a 3D model of the face. Finally, a value is calculated based on biometric algorithms. If this value exceeds a defined threshold, the person verification (liveness) is considered successful. If problems are encountered, the data will be manually verified by a human operator. The manual verification might take up to 24 hours. You will be notified in the TIER app if your data is referred to manual verification and you will be notified by e-mail about the outcome. If verification fails for whatever reason, you can always contact the TIER user support for clarification and manual verification.

All data, in particular the pictures of your drivers license and your face, is automatically deleted at latest 24 hours after successful completion, failure or abortion of the verification process. We only retain the verification status (i.e. verification successful / failed) and the expiry date of your drivers license as part of your user profile data.

The verification is a necessary prerequisite for entering into and the performance of the rental agreement pursuant to Art. 10 of the Data Protection Law, Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR and Art. 22(2)(a) GDPR.

 To the extent that pictures of your face are processed for identity verification purposes, the data processing is based on your consent pursuant to Art. 9(2)(a) GDPR and Art. 22(4) GDPR, taking into account Art. 16 of the Data Protection Law that applies to Sensitive Personal Data (as such term is defined in the Data Protection Law). We also record and retain a timestamp of your consent to the data processing based on our legitimate interest to prove the consent pursuant to Art. 4 of the Data Protection Law and Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR. You can withdraw your consent at any time, in particular by aborting the verification process.

We use IDnow GmbH, Auenstrae 100, 80469 Munich, Germany, as a service provider for the verification process. IDnow GmbH is acting as a subcontractor and data processor on our behalf and receives personal data solely for the performance of their services for us. They are contractually obliged not to use personal data for other purposes.

  1. E-moped user test

If you have signed up to our e-moped newsletter, you might receive an invitation to take part in our e-moped user test program.

If you choose to sign up to the user test program, you have to verify your drivers license and identity in the TIER app as described above. Of course we keep your verification status so you are already verified once the e-moped service is released.

We aim to identify potential bugs and problems, efficiency and user-friendliness of the signup and verification process with the user test program. Therefore, we will send you an email invitation to participate in a survey with questions about the signup and verification process and the overall user experience. Participation in the survey is voluntary. The survey data and your answers are stored and evaluated anonymously. The use of your data for the purpose of performing the survey is based on your consent, Art. 10 of the Data Protection Law and Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR.

We use SurveyMonkey Europe, 2 Shelbourne Buildings, Second Floor, Shelbourne Road, Dublin 4, as a technical service provider to conduct the survey. SurveyMonkey is acting as a subcontractor and data processor on our behalf and receives personal data solely for the performance of their services for us. They are contractually obliged not to use personal data for other purposes. SurveyMonkey Europe may use SurveyMonkey Inc., One Curiosity Way, San Mateo, CA 94403, United States as a sub-processor. We have entered into EU Standard Contractual Clauses with SurveyMonkey Inc. pursuant to Art. 46 GDPR. 

  1. Free unlocks for public transportation card holders

We ask for a photo of your public transportation card to check whether it is a valid card. We also ask for your name, e-mail address and phone number to check if you are a registered user and to credit your account with the 20 scooter unlocking codes. We do not use the data for any other purposes. We rely on your consent as the legal basis of this data processing (Art. 10 of the Data Protection Law and Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR).

Your public transportation card photo will be deleted as soon as we can verify it is a valid one, and this automatic deletion will happen no later than 1 hour after you upload it to our website.

  1. Product, research and advertising communication 

We'd like to communicate with you in certain circumstances. These may be to communicate new TIER products and services (more details in 8.1), to offer you to take part in user research initiatives (8.2), and to show you campaigns, promotions and advertising tailored to your user behaviour in the TIER app (8.3). Also, you can read more about how your data is used when you sign up to our newsletters (8.4) and how you can opt-out of receiving these communications (8.5).

8.1 New TIER products and services

From time to time, TIER releases new products, services and functionalities that we want you to know of. As some of these products and services may be available only in certain areas, we do not show these communications to all of our users, but only the ones who use TIER in the area where the service or product is now available. Hence, we need to process your location data for this purpose. We do not use user behaviour data to target you with these communications, and we rely on our legitimate interest of keeping you updated about our products to reach out to you. You may opt-out of this at any time under your app's "Settings". To do that, you only need to disable the toggle beside "service and products news".

8.2 TIER User research campaigns

We would like to know how our users like our service, products and features. For this reason, we would like to reach out to users who fulfil a certain criteria of usage in our app. Some of these criteria may be: users who have purchased certain packages, heavy users, users who only use one of our vehicles (e.g. TIER mopeds), users who use both of our vehicles (TIER mopeds and scooters), etc. If you fulfil one of these criteria, we may send you in-app notifications asking you to take part in our user research initiatives. We reach out to you based on our legitimate interest in understanding how you like our service, but participation in our user research initiatives is completely voluntary and therefore based on your consent.

8.3 TIER offer emails and personalised advertising 

We send our customers marketing communications about TIER products or services which are tailored to their profile (i.e. based on the information about a customer to predict their preferences). We send such communication to customers by email, SMS or in-app push notifications. We may send you this tailored marketing communication only with your consent, which can be revoked at any time in your app settings. In order to send you marketing communication tailored to your preferences, we will use the information you submitted during the creation of your customer account as well as automatically collected information, such as:

  • notices of receipt and read confirmations of messages;
  • information about your device and the browser used;
  • your activities in our apps;
  • your history of using TIER services.

We also send our customers non-personalised marketing communication (such as offer emails) from time to time. We may send you this information, as we have a legitimate interest to keep you up to date about our services. We will use the email address or other contact data you provided during the creation of your customer account for this purpose. In this way, our customers may only receive tailored messages about TIER products or services based on their preferences or non-tailored special offers of the TIER services. You will receive these notifications whether or not you registered for our newsletter.

If you wish to opt out at any time from these communications, you should email us at: privacy@tier.app

8.4 Newsletter

We would like to send our potential and existing customers advertising of our products and services and products of our cooperation partners by email on a regular basis. For this purpose, we will use the email address indicated for the registration to our newsletter and the country. As part of the registration to our newsletter, we will ask for your consent in the following way:

The identification of your email address is carried out through the double opt-in process. This means that you will receive a confirmation email in a further step to agree to the receipt of the newsletter. When subscribing to our newsletter, we log the following information:

  • IP address used;
  • time of the subscription to the newsletter;
  • time of mailing the confirmation email;
  • content of the confirmation email;
  • time of clicking on the confirmation link or archiving the email reply.

The purpose of this process is to prove your registration and resolve a potential misuse of your personal data. We will inform you about any withdrawal options in the confirmation email and in every newsletter.

8.5 Disclosure of data and revocation

The data will not be made available to third parties. Your data may be held only for the time we have a business relationship with you and if you did not object to this data processing

You will find a cancellation link in every notification, which is regarded as objection or revocation when clicked on. You can also send your objection to the receipt of product and advertising emails or the revocation of your consent regarding our newsletter by email to privacy@tier.app or by mail Tier Mobility AG (TIER, we), c/o WeWork Eichhornstr. 3, 10785 Berlin, Germany.

  1. User research

If you consent to taking part in one of our user research initiatives, we may ask you to fill a survey or participate in a recorded call with our Research team.

We may ask you for information such as your usage behaviour of TIER vehicles, your age range, the work industry you are in, your opinions and preferences of our services, etc. Participation in the survey or call is voluntary and based on your consent. If you decide to agree to taking part in a user interview with us, we will ask you whether you agree to a video recording. If you do not consent, you can let us know and we will do the interview without a video recording. Regardless of your option, we will ask you to sign electronically our consent declaration.

Your data will be deleted in no more than 6 months, and is usually kept for 3 months. This data is solely used for the purpose of research, and will later be used in an aggregated form to improve our services and products. You may withdraw your consent for the processing of your data, ask for information about this data, ask for a copy of it and ask for its deletion, given that it is within the 6 months of its retention.

We use SurveyMonkey for our surveys, Calendly for booking calls with participants and Google Meet for video and audio calls.

SurveyMonkey Europe, 2 Shelbourne Buildings, Second Floor, Shelbourne Road, Dublin 4. SurveyMonkey Europe may use SurveyMonkey Inc., One Curiosity Way, San Mateo, CA 94403, United States as a sub-processor.

Calendly LLC, BB&T Tower, 271 17th St NW, Atlanta, GA 30363, United States.

Google Ireland Limited, Google Building Gordon House, 4 Barrow St, Dublin, D04 E5W5, Ireland.

SurveyMonkey, Calendly and Google are acting as subcontractors and data processors on our behalf and receive personal data solely for the performance of their services for us. They are contractually obliged not to use personal data for other purposes. We have entered into EU Standard Contractual Clauses with SurveyMonkey Europe, Calendly LLC and Google LLC pursuant to Art. 46 GDPR. 

  1. Your data protection rights

10.1 Right to information

You have the right to demand information about the data stored about you, about the origin of the data, their recipients or categories of recipients, and the nature and purpose of the processing.

10.2 Right to revocation

If you have given your consent to the use of your personal data, you can revoke it for the future at any time without providing reasons.

10.3 Right to rectification

Should you later on establish that personal data held by us are not accurate or complete, you can correct or complete them in your customer account at any time or let them be corrected or completed by us.

10.4 Right to erasure (right to be forgotten)

Under certain circumstances you have the right to block or delete the data about your person held by us. The deletion or blocking of your personal data takes place as soon as we were able to verify the preconditions regarding the legitimacy of your demand. As far as the deletion of your data has legal, contractual, fiscal or business retention requirements or other legally based reasons, your data will be blocked instead of deleted. After your data have been deleted, an exchange of information is no longer possible.

10.5 Right to data portability

You may receive your personal data we processed and received from you in a machine-readable format designated by us or you can instruct us to directly transfer these data to a selected third person, if this recipient enables this from a technical point of view and no unreasonable burden or other confidentiality obligations or considerations on our part or from third persons prevent this.

10.6 Right to object

You are entitled at any time, and without giving reasons, to refuse the data processing for direct advertising purposes. It should be noted that the objection to data processing operations may limit or prevent the implementation of the framework contract and the processing of individual contracts.

10.7 Extended rights referring to the automated data processing for personalised data evaluation 

In relation to the automated data processing for personalised data evaluation you have, in addition to the above mentioned rights, the right to engage a natural person in the decision-making process as well as a right of appeal and a right to express our concern.

10.8 Contact for claims made in connection with the rights of the persons affected

For claims made in connection with the rights of the persons affected you can contact us via email to: privacy@tier.app or in writing to:

Tier Mobility AG, c/o WeWork Eichhornstr. 3, 10785 Berlin, Germany.

10.9 Right of appeal at the supervisory authority 

You have the right to lodge a complaint with a data protection supervisory authority against the processing of your personal data if you feel that your rights under the GDPR have been violated. You can contact the supervisory authority responsible for Berlin through the contact details below:

Berliner Beauftragte fr Datenschutz und Informationsfreiheit (BlnBDI)

Friedrichstrae 219, 10969 Berlin
Tel.: 030 13889 - 0
Fax: 030 2155050
Email: mailbox@datenschutz-berlin.de

You also have the right to file a complaint with the Compliance & Data Protection Department at the Qatar Ministry of Transport and Telecommunications (CDP).

You must complete the form included on this site: https://compliance.qcert.org/en/library/privacy (follow the Guidelines for Individuals)

Contact CDP

CDP Postal address:

Compliance and Data Protection (CDP) Department,

Ministry of Transport & Communications (MOTC),

P.O. Box 24514,

Al-Nasr Tower - B,

Opposite to Q-Post,

Corniche Street

Doha, Qatar

 

Privacy related inquiries:

Phone: +974 4406 9991 

e-mail: cdp-privacy@motc.gov.qa

 

  1. Changes to this Privacy Notice

We reserve the right to occasionally adapt this privacy notice so that it continually meets the current legal requirements or in order to incorporate changes to our services into the privacy notice, e.g. following the launch of new services. We recommend that you check the privacy notice for any changes on a regular basis. If a change to our services or the launch of a new service requires your prior consent, we shall inform you accordingly and ask for your permission.

  1. How to contact us

If you have any questions about this privacy notice, the data we hold on you, or you would like to exercise one of your data protection rights, please do not hesitate to contact us.

TIER Mobility Data Protection Officer

Email: dpo@tier.app

  1. How to contact the responsible supervisory authority

Should you wish to report a complaint or if you feel that TIER has not addressed your concern in a satisfactory manner, you have the right to contact the BlBI, the responsible supervisory authority for TIER, or CDP, the Qatari competent department at the Ministry of Transport and Telecommunications:

Berliner Beauftragte fr Datenschutz und Informationsfreiheit (BlnBDI)

Friedrichstrae 219, 10969 Berlin
Tel.: 030 13889 - 0
Fax: 030 2155050
Email: mailbox@datenschutz-berlin.de

Compliance and Data Protection (CDP):

Ministry of Transport & Communications (MOTC),

P.O. Box 24514,

Al-Nasr Tower - B,

Opposite to Q-Post,

Corniche Street

Doha, Qatar

 

Privacy related inquiries:

Phone: +974 4406 9991 

e-mail: cdp-privacy@motc.gov.qa

Slovakia

VYHLSENIE O OCHRANE DAJOV

1. vod

Nae vyhlsenie o ochrane dajov Vs informuje o zskavan a spracvan Vaich dajov spolonosou TIER. Plat pre aplikciu TIER, ako aj pre sluby mobility, ktor je mon objedna prostrednctvom naej aplikcie alebo cez partnersk aplikcie.

Zodpovednou osobou a prevdzkovateom je:

Tier Mobility Slovakia s.r.o. (TIER, my), Lazaretsk 8, 811 08 Bratislava mestsk

as Star Mesto, Slovensko, Kontakt: privacy@tier.app alebo support@tier.app

spolu s Tier Mobility SE (Tier Mobility Germany), c/o WeWork Eichhornstr. 3, 10785 Berln, Nemecko, Kontakt: privacy@tier.app alebo support@tier.app v zmysle l. 26 Veobecnho nariadenia o ochrane dajov (GDPR).

2. Zskavanie a spracvanie dajov pri pouvan naej aplikcie a sluieb

V naej aplikcii ponkame pouvateom monos registrcie po zadan osobnch dajov. Pre pouvanie sluieb TIER je nutn sa registrova. Okrem toho je mon si objedna nae sluby prostrednctvom tretch osb (pozri niie).

2.1 Registrcia

Pri registrovan sa v systme TIER potrebujeme od Vs na vytvorenie zkaznckeho tu nasledujce informcie:

  • Vae meno, priezvisko, e-mailov adresu a telefnne slo,
  • v zvislosti od krajiny, Vho pouvania a dostupnch sluieb, informcie ohadom Vho vodiskho oprvnenia, prp. doklad o veku,
  • daje pre Vami zvolen spsob platby.

Tieto daje pri registrcii v naej aplikcii zadte sami. Ak je mon zada alie nepovinn daje, bud prslune oznaen.

Mete vyui aj funkciu Single Sign On od Google alebo Apple (sluba SSO), aby ste si u ns zaloili et. V et sluby SSO (napr. V et v Google) sa prepoj s naou aplikciou. Tm zskame kmeov daje, ktor mte uloen v slube SSO (meno, priezvisko, e-mailov adresa, telefnne slo). Sluba SSO Vs poas prihlasovania informuje, ktor Vae daje sa poskytn nm, k omu Vy poskytnete V vslovn shlas alebo ho odmietnete poskytn. Upozorujeme, e prepojenm tov poskytovatelia sluby SSO mu zisti, e ste sa prihlsili do naej aplikcie a kedy sa tak stalo.

Registrovanie sa a zaloenie tu je nutnou podmienkou pre nami zabezpeovan prenjom vozidiel. Prvnym zkladom je l. 6 ods. 1 psm. b) GDPR.

2.2 Zskavanie a spracvanie dajov pri pouvan aplikcie TIER

Pri pouvan aplikcia resp. Vae koncov zariadenie automaticky odole na nae servery Vau aktulnu IP adresu a daje o Vaom koncovom zariaden (napr. pouvan operan systm, verzia, jazyk, typ/znaka/model prstroja, ID prstroja), ako aj dtum a as prihlsenia a zobrazen obsahy, resp. daje (daje na prstup).  S to technicky potrebn daje a zskavame ich automaticky pri pouvan naej aplikcie.

Prvnym zkladom je l. 6 ods. 1 psm. b) GDPR, pokia spracovanie dajov sli na zabezpeenie funknosti aplikcie a naich sluieb. V ostatnch prpadoch dochdza k spracvaniu dajov v zmysle l.  6 ods. 1 psm. f) GDPR na zklade nho oprvnenho zujmu na trvalej funknosti a bezpenosti a alom vvoji aplikcie a naich sluieb.

2.2.1 Oprvnenia aplikcie

Aby ste mohli vyuva nae sluby, potrebujeme prstup k niektorm funkcim Vho koncovho zariadenia (prstupov oprvnenia). V zvislosti od operanho systmu nm muste vslovne udeli oprvnenie, no kedykovek ho mete stiahnu.  Vetky daje, ku ktorm budeme ma v rmci tohto oprvnenia prstup, bud pouit len na ely uveden v tomto vyhlsen o ochrane dajov.

Fotoapart Prstup k funkcii Vho fotoapartu je potrebn na ely skenovania QR kdov na vozidlch. Okrem toho potrebujeme prstup k fotoapartu pre skontrolovanie Vho vodiskho preukazu a Vaej totonosti (pozri niie). V niektorch mestch navye poskytujeme aj sluby na zlepenie navigcie a pomoc pri parkovan optickm urovanm polohy. Na to vyuvame, medzi inmi, sluby Fantasmo Studios, Inc.340 S Lemon Ave 7650, Walnut, CA 91789, USA.

Poloha Potrebujeme informcie o Vaej polohe, aby sme Vm vedeli zobrazi vozidl nealeko od Vs a to, ako sa k nim dostanete. Informcie o Vaej polohe pri pouvan naej aplikcie a prenjme vozidla pouvame aj na ely skvalitovania a personalizovanie naich sluieb.

Prvnym zkladom je l. 6 ods. 1 psm. b) GDPR, kee spracovanie dajov sli na zabezpeenie funknosti aplikcie a naich sluieb.

2.2.2 Analza a vvoj aplikcie TIER

Aby sme mohli sstavne zlepova nae sluby, potrebujeme vedie, ako pouvatelia pouvaj nau aplikciu. Na tieto ely zskavame a spracvame najm nasledujce technick daje:  Informcie o prstroji (napr. daje o zariaden, operanom systme a verzie aplikcie, jazyk, asov psmo), as, kedy si spustte aplikciu TIER, Vae sprvanie v aplikcii (napr. vber vozidiel alebo rezervcie), dobu jej pouvania, resp. zotrvania v uritch funkcich, ako aj polohu prstroja.

Okrem toho pouvame slubu, ktor v prpade spadnutia aplikcie zachov diagnostick informcie, napr. typ prstroja, ID prstroja, verzia operanho systmu, stav aplikcie v momente spadnutia, crash trace, i intern technick protokolov daje aplikcie. Tieto informcie neobsahuj iadne priame osobn daje. Pouvame ich na analzy chb aplikcie a zlepenie jej stability a spoahlivosti.

Na reporty o spadnut aplikcie povame slubu Firebase od Google Ireland Ltd., Google Building Gordon House, Barrow Street, Dublin 4, Ireland (Google). Mme s Google uzatvoren zmluvu o spracvan dajov na zklade poverenia. Google iastone spracva daje na serveri v USA. Ak je potrebn osobn daje poskytn do USA a inm tretm krajinm, mme s Google uzatvoren tandardn doloky o ochrane dajov v zmysle l. 46 ods. 2 psm c) GDPR. Podrobnosti o tchto slubch njdete tu:  https://policies.google.com/technologies/partner-sites

Naa aplikcia pouva analytick slubu Google Analytics. Tto analyzuje sprvanie pouvateov naej aplikcie, aby sme na zklade tejto analzy vedeli zlepova nau aplikciu a ponuku. 

V rmci Google Analytics mme dohodnut nasledovn prvky ochrany dajov:
- anonymizovanie IP adries (skrtenie IP adresy pred vyhodnotenm, aby nebolo mon ich prepoji s Vaou osobou);
- automatick mazanie starch zznamov o pripojen / obmedzen doba uchovvania;
- deaktivovanie reklamnej funkcie (vrtane optovnho marketingu pre cieov skupiny cez GA Audience);
- deaktivovan personalizovan reklamy;
- deaktivovan measurement protocol;
- deaktivovan medzistrnkov sledovanie (signly Google);
- deaktivovan poskytovanie dajov inm produktom a slubm Google.

Google Analytics spracva nasledujce daje:
- anonymizovan IP adresa;
- pouvan funkcie, resp. zobrazen strnky (dtum, as, funkcia/URL, doba zotrvania na strnke);
- prp. dosiahnutie uritch cieov (conversions);
- technick informcie, vrtane operanho systmu, verzie a jazyka, typ prstroja, znaka a model;
- ID pre reklamy (v nastaveniach Vho koncovho zariadenia mete takto pouitie obmedzi; pri Androide je to v Nastavenia/Google/Oznmenia/Vyresetova ID pre reklamy, pri iOS je to v Nastavenia/Ochrana dajov/Reklamy/Vypn sledovanie pre reklamy);
- priblin poloha (krajina, prp. obec, na zklade anonymizovanej IP adresy).

Osobn daje spojen s ID pre reklamy, ktor zska Google Analytics, bud po 14 mesiacoch automaticky zmazan.  Mme s Google uzatvoren zmluvu o spracvan dajov na zklade poverenia. Google iastone spracva daje na serveri v USA. Ak je potrebn osobn daje poskytn do USA a inm tretm krajinm, mme s Google uzatvoren tandardn doloky o ochrane dajov v zmysle l. 46 ods. 2 psm c) GDPR.

Prvnym zkladom je l. 6 ods. 1 psm, f) GDPR, na zklade nho oprvnenho zujmu analyzova chyby v aplikcii, aby sme ich vedeli odstrni a zlepi nau aplikciu a analyzova pouvanie aplikcie v pseudonymizovanej podobe na ely skvalitovania aplikcie a naej ponuky.

2.2.3 Adjust

Na optimalizciu naich marketingovch aktivt vyuvame sluby adjust GmbH, Saarbrcker Str. 37A, 10405 Berln, Nemecko (Adjust). daje, ktor zska Adjust napr. o stiahnut si aplikcie TIER, o online reklamnom kanli, cez ktor djde k jej stiahnutiu, o ase spustenia aplikcie, dobe pouvania aplikcie a osobitne pouvanch funkcich aplikcie (najm o spenom prihlsen a ukonen jazdy). Adjust pouva na analzu IP a MAC adresy pouvateov, ktor sa vak po zskan hashuj, ako aj prslun AppID, a pokia je dostupn, aj mobile advertising ID.  Tieto daje sa spracvaj vlune pseudonymizovan, tzn. e sa nepouvaj na to, aby sa urili konkrtni pouvatelia alebo sa priradili k uritm osobm.

Tieto daje sa pouvaj na analyzovanie a vyhodnotenie performance naich marketingovch opatren a kanlov, na ztovanie marketingovch opatren naim marketingovm partnerom a rozpoznanie pokusov o podvod v svislosti s marketingovmi opatreniami (napr. podvod s klikmi, pri ktorom sa simulovanm klikov na reklamy cielene manipuluje so svisiacimi ztovacmi systmami). Tieto daje sa pouvaj aj na skvalitovanie aplikcie, a v pseudonymizovanej podobe aj na analyzovanie pouvania aplikcie a zlepenie aplikcie a naej ponuky. Shlas so zasielanm dajov spolonosti Adjust mete kedykovek stiahnu tu: https://www.adjust.com/forget-device/ . 

daje sa spracvaj v zmysle l. 6 ods. 1 psm. f) GDPR na zklade nho vyie uvedenho oprvnenho zujmu.

2.2.4 Google Maps

Aplikcia TIER pouva API aplikcie Google Maps od Google Ireland Ltd., Google Building Gordon House, Barrow Street, Dublin 4, Ireland. Vaka tomu Vm vieme napr. zobrazova interaktvne karty v naej aplikcii. Toto pouitie je nevyhnutn pre funknos a plnohodnotn pouvanie naich obsahov a sluieb. Podmienky pouvania Google njdete tu: https://www.google.com/intl/de/policies/terms/. alie podmienky pouvania Google Maps/Google Earth njdete tu: https://www.google.com/help/terms_maps.html. Vyhlsenie o ochrane dajov Google njdete tu: https://www.google.com/intl/de/policies/privacy/. Pouvame Google Maps na zobrazenie dostupnch vozidiel, ako aj na preklad geopolohy v adresch a zobrazenie vzdialenosti od Vs k zvolenmu vozidlu.

Prvnym zkladom je l. 6 ods. 1 psm. b) GDPR, kee spracovanie dajov sli na zabezpeenie funknosti aplikcie a naich sluieb.

2.2.5 Navigcia

V niektorch mestch poskytujeme v aplikcii integrovan navigan sluby. Pri tejto slube vyuvame navigan softvr Beeline od Relish Technologies Ltd, A212 The Biscuit Factory, 100 Drummond Road, London, United Kingdom (Beeline). Mete sa sami rozhodn, i tto slubu vyuijete (pokia je vo Vaom meste dostupn). Poas pouvania softvru Beeline zskava Beeline informcie o Vaej polohe a pohybe. Bliie informcie o spracvan dajov softvrom Beeline njdete na: https://beeline.co/pages/privacy .

Prvnym zkladom je l. 6 ods. 1 psm. b) GDPR, kee spracovanie dajov sli na zabezpeenie funknosti aplikcie a naich sluieb.

2.3 Zskavanie a spracvanie dajov pri prenajat si vozidla TIER

Pri prenajat si vozidla zskavame a spracvame alie daje o aplikcii a naich vozidlch. Prvnym zkladom je l. 6 ods. 1 psm. b) GDPR, pokia je spracvanie dajov potrebn na plnenie njomnej zmluvy, alebo l.  6 ods. 1 psm. f) GDPR na zklade nho oprvnenho zujmu na trvalej funknosti a bezpenosti a alom vvoji aplikcie a naich sluieb.

2.3.1 Zskavanie dajov v naej aplikcii

Ke si prenajmete nae vozidlo, zaznamenvame daje o polohe Vho zariadenia na zaiatku a konci njomnho vzahu. Pri kadom njomnom vzahu, kedy djde k uzatvoreniu njomnej zmluvy, uchovvame aj daje o trvan pouvania a o prenajatom vozidle. Tieto daje pouijeme najm na ztovanie njomnho.

2.3.2 Zskavanie dajov naimi vozidlami

Nae vozidl maj takzvan IoT boxy alebo telematick jednotky, ktor v pravidelnch krtkych intervaloch odosielaj daje (vrtane polohy a diagnostickch dajov vozidla - napr. stav batrie). Tak vieme zisti, kde sa nae vozidl nachdzaj, a ako rchlo sa pohybuj. IoT boxy odosielaj daje nezvisle od toho, i je vozidlo prve prenajat.

daje spojen s njomnm vzahom spracvame najm na nasledujce ely:

  • Aby sme zistili, i sa vozidlo nachdza v danej oblasti nasadenia TIER, resp. i m njom skoni mimo tejto oblasti nasadenia TIER - kee toto je v rozpore s naimi VOP. V takom prpade mu nae vozidl spusti poplach (geofencing).
  • Pri neobvykle dlhom pouvan (najm, ak sa vozidlo nehbe), meme njom ukoni.
  • Na zaslanie otzok nmu zkaznckemu servisu (napr. ak sa ned ukoni njom, neviete njs vozidlo, asistenn sluby v prpade nehody).
  • Ako dkaz v prpade nehody alebo kodovej udalosti.
  • Na ely ztovania. Do Vaej histrie vyuvania sluieb zaznamenme zaiaton a konen body Vaej jazdy, prp. polohu parkovania.
  • Na ely skvalitovania naich sluieb. Anonymnm tatistickm vyhodnocovanm miest, kde pouvatelia rezervuj vozidl a ukonuj jazdy, a obvyklch trs vieme optimalizova prerozdelenie naich vozidiel.

2.4 Zskavanie dajov pri kontaktovan, komunikcii a na socilnych sieach

2.4.1 Kontaktovanie naej spolonosti

Ak ns kontaktujete cez kontaktn formulr, e-mail alebo telefonicky, spracujeme Vami poskytnut daje na elu spracovania Vaej poiadavky a prp. doplnkov otzky. Komunikciu s Vami uchovvame v zmysle zkonom stanovench leht archivcie, minimlne vak do zruenia Vho zkaznckeho tu.

Prvnym zkladom je V a n oprvnen zujem spracova Vau poiadavku v zmysle l. 6 ods. 1 psm. f) GDPR.

Ak s tm vslovne shlaste, nahrme si telefont medzi Vami a nam zkaznckym servisom na ely internho kolenia a kontroly kvality. Nahrvky bud po 30 doch automaticky zmazan. Mte prvo V shlas kedykovek odvola. V takom prpade bude nahrvka bezodkladne zmazan.

Prvnym zkladom je l. 6 ods. 1 psm. a) GDPR.

2.4.2 Naa zmluvn komunikcia s Vami

Okrem toho Vm budeme zasiela potrebn informcie o naich slubch, zmene VOP, cien a podobn oblasti prostrednctvom e-mailu a/alebo push notifikci. Bliie informcie o marketingovej komunikcii s uveden niie.

Na to, aby ste vedeli prijma push notifikcie, muste vo Vaom koncovom zariaden povoli, resp. aktivova zasielanie push notifikci naou aplikciou. Kedykovek mete prijmanie notifikci push deaktivova. Pri iOS aj Androide sa to rob v menu aplikcie v asti Oznmenia.

Prvnym zkladom je l. 6 ods. 1 psm b) GDPR, pokia s tieto informcie relevantn pre zmluvn vzah. V ostatnch prpadoch je to V a n oprvnen zujem zskava informcie v zmysle  l. 6 ods. 1 psm. f) GDPR.

2.4.3 Prspevky na socilnych sieach

Ke zverejnte daje v svislosti s naimi profilmi na socilnych sieach na danej platforme (napr. komentre, verejn prspevky / posty, vide, fotky, like), bud tieto daje poskytovateom danej platformy zverejnen. Tieto daje na in ely nepouvame. Budeme prpadne Vami zverejnen obsahy na danej platforme cez n profil zdiea (napr. retweet), pokia to platforma umouje.

Vyhradzujeme si prvo vymaza obsahy na naom vlastnom profile, pokia to je mon a zd sa nm to potrebn. Vami zverejnen obsahy bud zmazan obvyklmi spsobmi a v zmysle politk danch socilnych platforiem.

Ke ns budete kontaktova cez socilne siete, budeme s Vami pri rieen Vaej poiadavky komunikova cez tto socilnu sie. Svisiace daje zmaeme, ke u ich uchovvanie nebude potrebn, prp. obmedzme ich spracvanie (ak sme zo zkona povinn ich uchovva), pokia takto zmazanie alebo obmedzenie spracvania socilna sie umouje.  Komunikcia cez socilne siete je potencilne nebezpen. Mete ns kedykovek kontaktova aj inmi kanlmi, ktor s popsan v tomto vyhlsen o ochrane dajov.

V svislosti s naimi profilmi nepouvame rozren reklamn monosti (napr. reklama na zklade zujmov, sprvania alebo polohy) socilnych siet. Pouvame len shrnn a anonymizovan tatistick daje o pouvan, ktor socilne siete tandardne poskytuj.

Nemme vplyv na daje, ktor socilne siete od Vs zskaj, ani na postupy ich spracvania. Nemme ani informcie o rozsahu dajov, ktor zskaj, el ich spracovania ani na lehoty ich uchovvania. Zo sksenosti vieme, e poskytovatelia tchto platforiem uchovvaj Vae daje vo forme uvateskho profilu a pouvaj ich na marketingov ely a na ely prieskumu trhu, ako aj na modifikcie svojich platforiem na zklade dopytu. Ak je to mon (napr. zmenou nastavenia i konfigurcie), sname sa o bezpen a sporn uchovvanie Vaich osobnch dajov na socilnych sieach.

Bliie informcie o spracvan dajov socilnymi sieami njdete vo vyhlseniach o ochrane dajov ich poskytovateov.

daje spojen s naou komunikciou na socilnych sieach (napr. Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, TikTok) spracvame na zklade nho oprvnenho zujmu pracova s verejnosou a komunikova s ou v zmysle l. 6 ods. 1 psm. f) GDPR.

2.5 Platby

Na platby vyuvame externch poskytovateov sluieb, ktorm poskytneme daje potrebn na realizciu platby (meno a priezvisko, e-mailov adresa, telefnne slo, miesta zaiatku a ukonenia jazdy, ID platby, spsob platby, prp. in daje o platobnch prostriedkoch, slo faktry, jazyk, znu/regin).

Prvny zklad poskytovateov platobnch sluieb spracvania dajov vo vlastnom mene njdete vo vyhlseniach o ochrane dajov tchto poskytovateov:

  • Braintree, spolonos skupiny PayPal (Europe) S.a r.l. et Cie, S.C.A., 22-24 Boulevard Royal, 2449 Luxemburg, Luxemburg (Braintree). Bliie informcie njdete vo vyhlsen o ochrane dajov spolonosti Braintree (https://www.braintreepayments.com/de/legal/braintree-privacy-policy).
  • Stripe Payments Europe Ltd, 25/28 North Wall Quay, Dublin 1, Ireland (Stripe). Bliie informcie njdete vo vyhlsen o ochrane dajov spolonosti Stripe (https://stripe.com/de/privacy).

V zvislosti od krajiny sa mu spsoby platby a ich poskytovatelia li.

Pokia ste nm nedali shlas v zmysle l. 6 ods. 1 psm. a) GDPR, je prvnymi zkladom poskytnutia dajov poskytovateom platobnch sluieb plnenie zmluvy v zmysle l. 6 ods. 1 psm. b) GDPR, kee je toto spracovanie potrebn na ztovanie njomnej zmluvy.

2.6 kody a nehody

V prpade pokodenia naich vozidiel a nehodch svisiacich s naimi vozidlami spracvame Vae daje (vrtane kmeovch a zmluvnch dajov a dajov o polohe a trase) na ely starostlivosti o zkaznka, regulovanie, spracovanie a likvidciu kody, na prijatie a spracovanie sanost, ako aj na zabezpeenie a uplatnenie vlastnch nrokov a na zamedzenie alch kd Vaej osobe alebo nm.

V tejto svislosti meme daje poskytn aj poisovniam na spracovanie kodovej udalosti a prslunm radom (napr. pri vsluchoch svedkov alebo obalovanch v priestupkovom a trestnom konan).

Prvnym zkladom je l. 6 ods. 1 psm. b), c) a f) GDPR. Ak sa po nehode spracvaj zdravotn daje, prvnym zkladom je l. 9 ods. 2 psm. f) GDPR. N oprvnen zujem pozostva najm zo spracovania kodovej udalosti a nehody, aby sme predili kodm naej spolonosti.

2.7 Poskytnutie dajov v prpade trestnch inov, priestupkov a poruen zmluvy

V svislosti s vyetrovanm trestnch inov alebo priestupkov meme poskytn daje (napr. kmeov daje, daje o trase/polohe, komunikan a zmluvn daje) prslunm orgnom innm v trestnom konan - napr. na ely vsluchu svedkov alebo obvinench. Toto sa me sta najm pri priestupkom voi vyhlke o premvke na cestnch komunikcich, pravidlm parkovania a podobnm zkonom. Naprklad, ak bude vozidlo v rozpore s naimi zmluvnmi ustanoveniami a vyhlkou o premvke na cestnch komunikcich nesprvne odstaven a TIER bude musie uhradi pokutu alebo jej bude hrozi trest, meme prslunm orgnom poskytn Vae daje, pokia ste si vozidlo naposledy prenajali a odstavili Vy. To ist plat pri nehodch, prekroen maximlnej povolenej rchlosti a podobnch priestupkoch. Ak si vo vyie popsanch prpadoch tretie osoby uplatnia oprvnen nroky voi TIER, vyhradzujeme si prvo poskytn Vae daje tmto iadateom.

Ak budete podozriv z trestnho inu alebo priestupku spojenho s naimi vozidlami alebo slubami, budeme spracva aj prpadn daje, ktor nm v tejto svislosti poskytn prslun orgny inn v trestnom konan.

Prvnym zkladom je zkonn povinnos poskytn daje v zmysle l. 6 ods. 1 psm. c) GDPR, prpadne n oprvnen zujem v zmysle l. 6 ods. 1 psm. f) GDPR odvrti kodu naej spolonosti a ochrni nae vozidl a zmluvn a mimozmluvn prva s tm spojen.

2.8 Poskytnutie anonymnch dajov MDS a GBFS

daje o pouvan naich vozidiel zdieame vo formte Mobility Data Specification Datenformat (MDS; https://github.com/openmobilityfoundation/mobility-data-specification) a General Bike Feed Specification Datenformat (GBFS; https://github.com/NABSA/gbfs) s uritmi partnermi, ako s mest a vskumn stavy.  Tieto daje neobsahuj pecifick daje o pouvateoch (ie iadne e-mailov adresy, men, telefnne sla ani in identifiktory alebo oznaenia pouvateov). 

Mest a obce tieto daje pouvaj pre lepie plnovanie dopravnch opatren a infratruktry, preskmanie bezpenosti premvky a zvenie udratenosti.

Aj ke nejde o osobn daje, ich prjemcovia s zaviazan ich pouva len na vyie uveden ely a primerane ich chrni.

2.9 Kontrola vodiskho preukazu a veku

V zvislosti od toho, kde a ak nae sluby chcete vyui, musme skontrolova V vodisk preukaz a/alebo Vau totonos, resp. V vek. Na to pouvame nasledovn automatick overovac postup:

  • Vam smartfnom odfotte predn a zadn stranu Vho vodiskho preukazu. Na fotkch sa potom nachdzaj nasledujce informcie: fotka, meno a priezvisko, dtum narodenia, slo vodiskho preukazu alebo inho preukazu, krajina, ktor preukaz vystavila, dtum exspircie, dtum vystavenia, dtum vystavenia a triedy vodiskho oprvnenia.
  • Nsledne sa over, i osoba na fotke vodiskho alebo inho preukazu je skutone danm pouvateom. Preto je potrebn, aby ste si odfotili tvr (video selfie), ktor sa porovn s fotkou na Vaom vodiskom preukaze alebo inom preukaze.
  • Pri foten si tvre sa zrove over, i fotte ivho loveka. To sa urob tak, e systm vytvor 3D model Vaej tvre, ktor sa taktie porovn s fotkou na Vaom vodiskom alebo inom preukaze.

V prpade problmov sa tieto daje overia do 24 hodn manulne. O potrebe a vsledku manulneho overenia budete oboznmen. Pokia z nejakho dvodu nebude mon fotky manulne overi, mete sa kedykovek obrti na n zkazncky servis.

Fotky Vho vodiskho preukazu a Vaej tvre bud automaticky zmazan najneskr o 7 dn po spenom uzatvoren, zlyhan alebo preruen procesu overovania.
V rmci overovania Vho dokladu uchovvame tieto daje:
Vae meno a priezvisko, slo vodiskho alebo inho preukazu, typ dokladu a triedu vodiskho oprvnenia, krajinu, ktor preukaz vystavila, dtum exspircie, status a asov peiatku overenia.

Na overovac proces vyuvame sluby die IDnow GmbH, Auenstrae 100, 80469 Mnchov, Nemecko, ako nho dodvatea. IDnow GmbH dostane osobn daje vlune na poskytnutie sluby nm ako jej zkaznkovi.

V zvislosti od Vaej polohy a vozidla, ktor si chcete prenaja, je overenie Vaej totonosti predpokladom na uzatvorenie a plnenie njomnej zmluvy v zmysle l. 6 ods. 1 psm. b) GDPR. Pokia sa fotky Vaej tvre spracvaj na ely overenia totonosti, daje sa spracvaj na zklade shlasu v zmysle l. 6 ods. 1 psm. a) a l. 9 ods. 2 GDPR. V shlas mete kedykovek stiahnu, najm ukonenm procesu overovania.

2.10 Zavy pre uritch pouvateov

V zvislosti od miesta prenajatia ponkame uritm pouvateom zavy - napr., ak mte predplaten miestnu hromadn dopravu, prp. ak ste tudent alebo dchodca. Na tieto ely potrebujeme doklad o Vaom nroku na zavu (napr. fotku Vho tudentskho preukazu), ktor mete nahra na urenej webstrnke. Tam dostanete aj alie informcie o spracvan a lehote uchovvania dajov. Fotka Vho preukazu sa obyajne over a vymae do 24 hodn od jej nahratia - akonhle sa nm podar overi, e je preukaz platn. Budete o tom informovan nam zkaznckym servisom.

daje nepouvame na in ely a spracvame ich na zklade Vho shlasu v zmysle l. 6 ods. 1 psm. a) a l. 9 ods. 2 psm. a) GDPR.

2.11 alie ely spracvania dajov

Vae osobn daje okrem toho spracvame na nasledujce ely:

V zmysle l. 6 ods. 1 psm. f) GDPR na zklade nho oprvnenho zujmu

  • stleho vylepovania naej ponuky a sluieb a ich prispsobovania potrebm naich pouvateov,
  • na ely internch kontrol kvality,
  • na rozpoznanie, odstrnenie a predchdzanie chybm, poruchm a zneuitiu,
  • na zabezpeenie naej siete a informci,
  • na predchdzanie podvodom,
  • na zabezpeenie a uplatnenie naich prvnych nrokov,
  • na predchdzanie optovnch registrci pouvateov, ktor boli zablokovan z dvodu protiprvneho konania, podvodu alebo zneuitia,
  • na ely vedenia tovnctva a riadenia rizk.

V zmysle l. 6 ods. 1 psm. c) GDPR na splnenie si prvnej povinnosti, napr. na dodriavanie obchodnoprvnych a daovch povinnost archivcie alebo na splnenie si povinnost poskytn tieto daje na zklade prvoplatnho sdneho rozhodnutia alebo radnho nariadenia.

3. Objednvka naich sluieb cez tretie osoby

Nae sluby mobility je mon v niektorch reginoch objedna cez partnersk aplikcie tretch osb. V takom prpade partneri sprostredkvaj njomn zmluvy pre vozidl medzi nami a Vami. Zaloenie si zkaznckeho tu a pouvanie naej aplikcie v takch prpadoch nie je potrebn.

Spravidla vtedy nedostvame od partnerov iadne osobn daje, ale len pseudonymizovan oznaenia pouvateov, informcia o konkrtnej objednvke (o sa kde a za ak cenu prenajma) a pokia je to potrebn, informciu o tom, e pouvate m platn vodisk oprvnenie. V uritch prpadoch nm partneri poskytn Vae meno a priezvisko, e-mailov adresu a telefnne slo. Tieto daje si vyiadavame len na zklade oprvnenho zujmu, napr. ak djde k nehode, trestnej innosti, priestupku, na ely ztovania alebo zodpovedanie otzok pre zkazncku podporu.

Vae daje spojen s prenjmom vozidla spracvame ako uvdzame vyie (okrem dajov zskanch cez aplikciu), najm telematick daje z vozidiel.  Prvny zklad takhoto spracvania dajov je tie uveden vyie.

S partnermi mme uzatvoren zmluvy o spolonej zodpovednosti v zmysle l. 26 GDPR. Plat pri tom nasledovn:

  • Za spracvanie dajov v svislosti s partnerskou aplikciou (vrtane zskavania dajov, zakladania zkaznckych tov v partnerskej aplikcii, overovania vodiskho a inho preukazu potvrdzujceho vek a platby) nesie zodpovednos n partner.
  • Za spracvanie dajov v svislosti s realizciou prenjmu vozidla nesieme zodpovednos my.

Kee pri rezervcii cez partnersk aplikciu spravidla o Vs ako o zkaznkovi nezskame iadne alie informcie, partner je naou primrnou kontaktnou osobou pre prva dotknutch osb. Vae prva dotknutej osoby si mete uplatni voi nm, ako aj voi nmu partnerovi.

Nai partneri, ktor umouj rezervciu naich sluieb (dostupnos partnerskch aplikci a sluieb je momentlne dostupn len v niektorch reginoch), s:

  • Berliner Verkehrsbetriebe (BVG) AR, Holzmarktstrasse 15-17, 10179 Berln, Nemecko (Jelbi)
  • Intelligent Apps GmbH, Neumhlen 19, 22763 Hamburg, Nemecko (FreeNow Germany)
  • mytaxi Network Ireland Ltd., 11 Upper Mount Street, Dublin 2, rsko (FreeNow Ireland)
  • Transcovo SAS a Transopco SAS, 4 Place du 8 Mai 1945, Immeuble Le Hub, 92300 Levallois-Perret, Franczsko (FreeNow France)
  • mytaxi Polska Sp. z o.o., ul. Mlynarska 42, 01-205 Varava, Posko (FreeNow Poland)
  • Hamburger Hochbahn AG, Steinstrae 20, 20095 Hamburg, Nemecko (hvv switch)
  • Sixt GmbH & Co. Autovermietung KG, Zugspitzstr. 1, 82049 Pullach, Nemecko (Sixt)
  • Nobina Travis AB, org.nr 559264-1756, Armgatan 38, 171 71 Solna, vdsko (Travis)
  • moovel Group GmbH, Hauptsttter Strae 149, 70178 Stuttgart, Nemecko (Reach Now)
  • Aachener Straenbahn und Energieversorgungs-AG, Neukllner Str. 1, 52068 Aachen, Nemecko (movA)
  • Mnchner Verkehrsgesellschaft mbH, Emmy-Noether Str. 2, 80992 Mnchen, Nemecko (MVGO)
  • Rheinbahn AG, Lierenfelder Str. 42, 40231 Dsseldorf, Nemecko (redy)
  • SBB AG, Neue Mobilittsdienstleistungen, Bollwerk 10, Bern, vajiarsko (yumuv)
  • MaaS Global Ltd, Lnnrotinkatu 18, 00120 Helsinki, Fnsko (Whim)
  • iMobility GmbH, Weyringergasse 5/B4, A-1040 Viede, Raksko (Wegfinder)
  • Trafi GmbH, Chausseestrasse 6, 10115 Berln, Nemecko (Trafi)

4. Prenos osobnch dajov

Nami zskan daje poskytujeme inm osobm v zmysle vyie uvedenho a inak zsadne len, ak:

  • nm na to v zmysle l. 6 ods. 1 psm. a) GDPR dte vslovn shlas,
  • ak je ich poskytnutie v zmysle l. 6 ods. 1 psm. f) GDPR nutn na uplatnenie, plnenie a hjenie prvnych nrokov a nie je dvod predpoklada, e mte v nrok na ochranu tchto dajov ich neposkytnutm tretm osobm,
  • ak sme v zmysle l. 6 ods. 1 psm. c) GDPR zo zkona povinn tak urobi, alebo
  • ak je to zo zkona povolen a v zmysle l. 6 ods. 1 psm. b) GDPR nutn na plnenie si zmluvnch povinnost voi Vm a realizciu predzmluvnch opatren na zklade Vaej poiadavky.

Na spracvanie dajov vyuvame sluby tretch osb na zklade naej objednvky a ktor tieto osobn daje nesm poui na vlastn ely. Okrem poskytovateov sluieb vslovne spomenutch v tomto vyhlsen o ochrane dajov, do tejto kategrie mu patri najm poskytovatelia IT sluieb a vpotovch stredsk, poskytovatelia technickch sluieb, agentry, spolonosti zaoberajce sa prieskumom trhu, spolonosti koncernu alebo poradensk spolonosti.

Meme aj vyui sluby dodvateov, ktor maj sdlo v takzvanch tretch krajinch mimo Eurpskej nie, resp. Eurpskeho hospodrskeho priestoru, alebo tam spracvaj osobn daje. Ak v takom prpade tieto krajiny nemaj rozhodnutie o primeranosti v zmysle l. 45 GDPR, zavedieme primeran opatrenia, aby sme zabezpeili primeran rove ochrany dajov pre prpadn prenosy dajov. Sem sa radia, okrem inho, tandardn zmluvn doloky Eurpskej nie (prp. aj dodaton dohody poda odporan radov pre dohad nad ochranou dajov) alebo zvzn intern predpisy ochrany dajov.

5. Reklama

Vae daje spracvame aj na ely zobrazovania alebo zasielania personalizovanch reklm. Na to vyuvame daje, ktor ste zadali pri registrcii, histriu Vaich rezervci, ako aj daje zskan poas pouvania naej aplikcie alebo potvrdenia o prijat a pretan si sprv. Spracvame tu aj najm daje o Vaej polohe, kee niektor nae produkty a sluby s dostupn len v uritch oblastiach a my s nimi oslovujeme len pouvateov v tchto oblastiach. Mete nm kedykovek da vedie, e s tmto spracvanm neshlaste, prpadne mete zrui V et.

Pokia nie je potrebn V shlas v zmysle l. 6 ods. 1 psm. a) GDPR, Vae daje spracvame na reklamn ely na zklade nho oprvnenho zujmu zasiela priame reklamn ponuky v zmysle l. 6 ods. 1 psm. f) GDPR.

5.1. Newsletter

Mete sa prihlsi na odber nho newslettera a budete tak pravidelne dostva informcie o naich slubch, pecilnych ponukch alebo ankety. Tieto e-maily Vm budeme zasiela len s Vam vslovnm shlasom. Na zaprotokolovanie Vho shlasu na zklade nho oprvnenho zujmu v zmysle l. 6 ods. 1 psm. f) GDPR zskavame nasledovn informcie, ktor uchovvame a do odhlsenia sa z odberu newslettera alebo zruenia Vho tu: pouit IP adresa, dtum a as prihlsenia sa do odberu newslettera, dtum a as odoslania potvrdzujceho e-mailu, obsah tohto e-mailu, dtum a as kliknutia na potvrdzujci link, resp. archivcia odpovede.

Z odberu nho newslettera sa mete kedykovek odhlsi kliknutm na odhlasovac link v kadej e-mailovej sprve alebo zaslanm e-mailu na support@tier.app.

Prvnym zkladom je l. 6 ods. 1 psm. a) GDPR.

5.2. E-maily s odporanmi produktami a push notifikcie

Aj ke sa neprihlsite na odber newslettra, budeme Vm obas posiela e-maily s odporanmi produktami, anketami alebo iadosami o ohodnotenie produktov. Tieto e-maily budete dostva len vtedy, ke vyuvate nae sluby. Ak u tieto e-maily od ns nechcete dostva, mete proti tomu kedykovek bezplatne namieta tm, e kliknete na odhlasovac link v kadej e-mailovej sprve alebo zaslanm e-mailu na support@tier.app.

Nastavenia push notifikci mete kedykovek zmeni vo Vaom operanom systme (pozri vyie).

Prvnym zkladom je l. 6 ods. 1 psm. f) GDPR (Reklama pre existujcich zkaznkov).

5.3. Online zobrazovanie reklamy

Taktie Vm budeme zobrazova reklamy mimo naej aplikcie v takzvanch in-app notifications a mimo naich vlastnch sluieb. Mete spracvanie Vaich dajov na takto ely zrui v nastaveniach aplikcie. Prosm, dbajte na to, e stle budete mc vidie reklamy na in ako nae sluby, hoci zrute spracvanie Vaich dajov na tieto ely.

Prvnym zkladom je l. 6 ods. 1 psm. f) GDPR.

6. Prieskum trhu

Aby sme nae produkty sstavne zlepovali a lepie rozumeli naim pouvateom, spracvame Vae daje na ely prieskumu trhu. Spracvame pri tom daje o Vaich trasch, o Vaom sprvan sa pouvatea a daje, ktor ste zadali pri registrcii.
Na zklade tchto dajov pozvame naich pouvateov (v zvislosti od typu pozvnku vak len s ich shlasom) k dobrovonej asti na iniciatvach prieskumu trhu, tdich a anketch. Ak sa takchto prieskumov chcete zastni, budete osobitne informovan o s tm spojenom zskavan a spracvan dajov. Kee sluby TIER s novou slubou mobility, nai partneri (najm mest, reginy alebo ministerstv dopravy) maj vek zujem o vsledky nho prieskumu trhu a svisiace zistenia. Preto TIER tmto partnerom poskytuje shrnn a anonymizovan vsledky.

Prvnym zkladom je n oprvnen zujem o prieskum trhu a optimalizciu a rozvoj naej ponuky v zmysle l. 6 ods. 1 psm. f) GDPR.

7. Vmaz

Zo zsady uchovvame osobn daje len tak dlho, ako je to potrebn na splnenie ich elu, na ktor sme ich zskali. Po tom tieto daje bezodkladne zmaeme, pokia ich nepotrebujeme uchovva ete do uplynutia premlacej lehoty na ely dokazovania pri obianskoprvnych nrokoch alebo pokia ich nie sme zo zkona povinn uchovva dlhie.

Na ely dokazovania meme zmluvn daje uchovva tri roky po konci roku, v ktorom sa n obchodn vzah skonil. Akkovek nroky s v zmysle zkonnej premlacej lehoty premlan najskr uplynutm vyie uvedenej lehoty.

Aj potom vak ete musme niektor Vae daje z tovnch dvodov uchovva. Vzahuje sa na ns pri tom zkonn povinnos archivcie na zklade Obianskeho zkonnka, Daovho poriadku, Zkona o veroch, Zkona o legalizcii prjmu z trestnej innosti a Zkona o cennch papieroch. Zkonn lehoty na archivovanie podkladov s od dvoch do desa rokov.

8. Spracvanie dajov v rmci skupiny TIER

TIER Mobility Germany m v rmci skupiny TIER stredn lohu prevdzky IT systmov, technickej prevdzky aplikcie, zkaznckej podpory a veobecn sprvu zmluvnch vzahov so zkaznkmi.  Kontaktn daje zodpovednej osoby za ochranu dajov spolonosti TIER Mobility Germany s niie.

V tejto svislosti sa Vae osobn daje poskytn TIER Mobility Germany alebo ich tto spolonos priamo zska a spracuje. Prvnym zkladom je n oprvnen zujem na efektvnej podnikovej organizcii v zmysle l. 6 ods. 1 psm. f) GDPR v spojen s recitlom . 48. TIER Mobility Germany spracva Vae daje vlune v zmysle tohto vyhlsenia o ochrane dajov a na tu uveden ely. Ustanovenia tohto vyhlsenia o ochrane dajov sa tak primerane uplatnia na spracvanie dajov spolonosou TIER Mobility Germany.

S TIER Mobility Germany mme uzatvoren zmluvu o spolonej zodpovednosti v zmysle l. 26 GDPR, v ktorej s oetren vyie uveden body. Vae prva dotknutej osoby si mete uplatni voi nm, ako aj voi TIER Mobility Germany.

9. Prva dotknutch osb

V prpade splnenia zkonnch podmienok v zmysle l. 15-21 a l. 77 GDPR mte ako dotknut osoba nasledujce prva:

  • prvo na stiahnutie shlasu;
  • prvo namieta voi spracvaniu Vaich osobnch dajov (l. 21 GDPR);
  • prvo na prstup k Vaim spracvanm dajom (l. 15 GDPR);
  • prvo na opravu Vaich osobnch dajov, ktor uchovvame (l. 16 GDPR);
  • prvo na vymazanie Vaich osobnch dajov (l. 17 GDPR);
  • prvo na obmedzenie spracvania Vaich osobnch dajov (l. 18 GDPR);
  • prvo na prenosnos Vaich osobnch dajov (l. 20 GDPR);
  • prvo poda sanos dozornmu orgnu (l. 77 GDPR).

Mte prvo udelen shlas kedykovek s budcou innosou odvola. Odvolanm shlasu nie je dotknut platnos spracvania, ku ktormu predtm dolo na zklade Vho shlasu.

Pokia spracvame Vae daje na zklade oprvnenho zujmu, mte prvo kedykovek voi tomuto spracvaniu namieta - z dvodov Vaej osobitnej situcie. Pokia ide o namietanie proti spracvaniu dajov na ely priameho marketingu, mte generlne prvo nmietky, kedy nemuste uvies dvody.

Ak si chcete uplatni Vae prva, mete sa kedykovek obrti na vyie uveden kontaktn osobu alebo zasla e-mail na privacy@tier.app alebo suppport@tier.app. Pri tom Vs poprosme o preukzanie totonosti, napr. zaslanm iadosti z e-mailovej adresy uloenej vo Vaom te.

Vae iadosti na uplatnenie si prv dotknutch osb a nae odpovede bud na ely archivcie uchovvan po dobu do troch rokov a v ojedinelch prpadoch aj dlhie na ely uplatnenia, vkonu a hjenia prvnych nrokov.

Prvnym zkladom je l. 6 ods. 1 psm. f) GDPR, na zklade nho zujmu na obhajoby voi prpadnm obianskoprvnym nrokov v zmysle l. 82 GDPR, zamedzeniu pokt v zmysle l. 83 GDPR, ako aj plnenia si povinnosti preukzania sladu v zmysle l. 5 ods. 2 GDPR.

Nau zodpovedn osobu za ochranu dajov zastihnete na dpo@tier.app alebo na vyie uvedenej adrese (do rk: zodpovednej osoby za ochranu dajov).  Vslovne upozorujeme, e pri pouvan e-mailovej adresy nem k obsahu prstup len naa zodpovedn osoba za ochranu dajov. Ak chcete zasla dvern informcie, prosme, zalite najprv iados o zaslanie adresy priamo na adresta.

Mte prvo saova sa na spracvanie dajov na dozornom orgne pre ochranu dajov.

10. Zmeny vyhlsenia o ochrane dajov

Budeme toto vyhlsenie o ochrane dajov prleitostne upravova, aby vdy zodpovedalo aktulnym prvnym poiadavkm a skutkovmu stavu (napr. pri zaveden novej sluby alebo novch funkci). Odporame Vm preto si toto vyhlsenie o ochrane dajov pravidelne kontrolova.

Posledn aktualizcia: 10.12.2021

Spain

Declaracin de proteccin de datos

1. Introduccin

Nuestra Declaracin de proteccin de datos le informa sobre la recogida y el tratamiento de sus datos por parte de TIER. Tiene validez para la aplicacin TIER, as como para los servicios de movilidad que pueden reservarse a travs de nuestra aplicacin o de aplicaciones asociadas.

El responsable del tratamiento de datos y proveedor de servicios es:

TIER Mobility Spain S.L.U (TIER, nosotros),  sociedad de nacionalidad espaola con domicilio a efectos de notificaciones en la carretera Fuencarral-Alcobendas Km 3,800 - Arbea Campus (Alcobendas) y NIF nmero B88226865, contacto privacy@tier.app o support@tier.app

junto con Tier Mobility SE (Tier Mobility Germany), c/o WeWork Eichhornstr. 3, 10785 Berln, Alemania, contacto: privacy@tier.app o support@tier.app, de conformidad con el artculo 26 del RGPD.

2. Recogida y tratamiento de datos  al utilizar nuestra aplicacin y servicios

En nuestra aplicacin, ofrecemos a los usuarios la posibilidad de registrarse proporcionando una serie de datos personales. El registro es obligatorio para utilizar los servicios de TIER. Tambin es posible reservar nuestros servicios a travs de terceros proveedores (vase ms abajo). 

2.1 Registro

Cuando se registra en TIER, le solicitamos la siguiente informacin para poder crear una cuenta de cliente:

  • su nombre, direccin de correo electrnico y nmero de telfono;
  • dependiendo de su pas, su uso y los servicios particulares disponibles, informacin sobre su permiso de conduccin y acreditacin de edad;
  • informacin sobre su mtodo de pago. 

Puede introducir esta informacin usted mismo en nuestra aplicacin cuando se registre. En caso de que se pueda proporcionar informacin adicional de forma voluntaria, se marcar de la forma correspondiente.

Tambin puede utilizar la denominada funcin de inicio de sesin nico de Google o Apple (proveedor de SSO) para crear una cuenta con nosotros. Su cuenta con el proveedor de SSO (por ejemplo, su cuenta de Google) estar entonces vinculada a nuestra aplicacin. Los datos maestros que almacene con el proveedor de SSO (nombre, direccin de correo electrnico, nmero de telfono) sern visibles para nosotros. Los proveedores de SSO le informarn durante el proceso de registro sobre los datos que se van a transferir; usted puede dar su consentimiento explcito o rechazarlo. Rogamos tenga en cuenta que al vincular las cuentas, los proveedores de SSO sabrn si usted se conecta con nosotros y cundo lo hace.

Registrarse y crear una cuenta es un requisito previo para poder alquilar vehculos. La base legal es el artculo 6, apartado 1, letra b) del RGPD.

2.2 Recogida y tratamiento de datos  al utilizar la aplicacin TIER

Cuando usted utiliza la aplicacin o su dispositivo, su direccin IP actual y la informacin sobre su dispositivo (por ejemplo, el sistema operativo utilizado, la versin, el idioma, el tipo/marca/modelo del dispositivo, el ID del dispositivo), as como la fecha y la hora de acceso y el contenido o los datos recuperados se transmiten automticamente a nuestros servidores (datos de acceso). Se trata de informacin tcnicamente necesaria y la recogemos automticamente cuando usted utiliza nuestra aplicacin. 

La base legal es el artculo 6, apartado 1, letra b) del RGPD, en la medida en que el tratamiento de datos sirve para proporcionar las funcionalidades de la aplicacin y nuestros servicios. Adems, el tratamiento de los datos se lleva a cabo de conformidad con el artculo 6, apartado 1, letra f) del RGPD, sobre la base de nuestro inters legtimo en la funcionalidad y la seguridad sostenidas, as como en el desarrollo ulterior de la aplicacin y de nuestros servicios.

2.2.1 Permisos de la aplicacin 

Para utilizar nuestros servicios, necesitamos acceder a determinadas funciones de su dispositivo (los denominados permisos). Dependiendo de su sistema operativo, debe conceder explcitamente el permiso o puede revocarlo en cada caso. Los datos a los que podamos acceder en el marco de las autorizaciones solo se utilizarn para los fines indicados en esta Declaracin de proteccin de datos.

Cmara El acceso a su funcin de cmara es necesario para escanear el cdigo QR colocado en el vehculo antes de alquilarlo. La cmara tambin es necesaria para verificar su permiso de conduccin y su identidad (ver ms abajo). Adems, en algunas ciudades tambin ofrecemos un servicio para mejorar la precisin de la localizacin y ayudar a aparcar correctamente mediante la deteccin visual de la ubicacin. Para ello, utilizamos los servicios de Fantasmo Studios, Inc.340 S Lemon Ave 7650, Walnut, CA 91789, EE. UU., entre otros.

Ubicacin Necesitamos informacin sobre su ubicacin para mostrarle los vehculos que estn cerca de usted y cmo llegar a ellos. Adems, procesamos informacin sobre su ubicacin cuando utiliza la aplicacin o alquila un vehculo para mejorar nuestros servicios y ofrecerle una experiencia personalizada.

La base legal es el artculo 6, apartado 1, letra b) del RGPD, en la medida en que el tratamiento de datos sirve para proporcionar las funcionalidades de la aplicacin y nuestros servicios.

2.2.2 Anlisis de la aplicacin TIER y posterior desarrollo

Para poder optimizar continuamente nuestro servicio, es importante para nosotros entender cmo utilizan los usuarios nuestra aplicacin. Para ello, tambin recogemos y procesamos los siguientes datos tcnicos: informacin sobre el dispositivo (por ejemplo, dispositivo, sistema operativo y versin de la aplicacin, idioma, zona horaria), la hora en que usted abre la aplicacin TIER, su comportamiento en la aplicacin (por ejemplo, la seleccin de vehculos o la reserva), la duracin del uso o el tiempo empleado en determinadas funcionalidades, y la ubicacin de su dispositivo. 

Adems, utilizamos un servicio para obtener informacin de diagnstico como el tipo de dispositivo, el ID del dispositivo, la versin del sistema operativo, el estado de la aplicacin en caso de cada, el seguimiento de la cada y los datos del registro tcnico interno de la aplicacin en caso de fallo de la misma. Esta informacin no contiene datos personales directamente identificables. La utilizamos para analizar los errores de la aplicacin y as mejorar la estabilidad y la fiabilidad.

Para los informes de accidentes, utilizamos Firebase, un servicio de Google Ireland Ltd, Google Building Gordon House, Barrow Street, Dubln 4, Irlanda (Google). Hemos celebrado un acuerdo de procesamiento de datos con Google. En algunos casos, los datos se procesan en un servidor de Google en Estados Unidos. En el caso de que los datos personales se transfieran a los Estados Unidos o a otros terceros pases, hemos concluido clusulas contractuales estndar con Google de conformidad con el artculo 46, apartado 2, letra c) del RGPD. Puede encontrar ms informacin sobre estos servicios aqu:  https://policies.google.com/technologies/partner-sites

Nuestra aplicacin utiliza Google Analytics, un servicio de anlisis proporcionado por Google. Al utilizarlo, analizamos su comportamiento de uso en nuestra aplicacin para, tomando como base estos datos, poder mejorar nuestra aplicacin y nuestras ofertas. 

  • Hemos elegido la siguiente configuracin de privacidad para Google Analytics:
  • anonimizacin de la IP (acortamiento de la direccin IP antes del anlisis con el fin de que no se puedan extraer conclusiones sobre su identidad);                                            
  • eliminacin automtica de registros antiguos / limitacin del perodo de almacenamiento;                                                                                                      
  • desactivacin de la funcin publicitaria (incluido el remarketing de grupos objetivo por parte de GA Audience);
  • desactivacin de los anuncios personalizados;                                                                  
  • desactivacin del protocolo de medicin; 
  • desactivacin del seguimiento de pginas cruzadas (seales de Google);                         
  • desactivacin del intercambio de datos con otros productos y servicios de Google. 

Google Analytics procesa los siguientes datos:

  • direccin IP anonimizada;          
  • funciones utilizadas o pginas visitadas (fecha, hora, funcin/URL, tiempo de permanencia); 
  • si procede, informacin tcnica, incluido el sistema operativo, versin e idioma; tipo de dispositivo, marca, modelo; 
  • ID de anuncios para mviles (puede restringir este uso en la configuracin de su dispositivo; para Android en Ajustes/Google/Publicidad/Restablecer ID de anuncios, para iOS en Ajustes/Privacidad/Publicidad/Sin seguimiento de anuncios); 
  • ubicacin aproximada (pas y, si procede, ciudad, segn la direccin IP anonimizada).

Los datos personales vinculados a la identificacin publicitaria recogidos por Google Analytics se eliminan automticamente despus de 14 meses. Hemos celebrado un acuerdo de procesamiento de datos con Google. En algunos casos, los datos se procesan en un servidor de Google en Estados Unidos. En el caso de que los datos personales se transfieran a los Estados Unidos o a otros terceros pases, hemos concluido clusulas contractuales estndar con Google de conformidad con el artculo 46, apartado 2, letra c) del RGPD.

La base legal es el artculo 6, apartado 1, letra f) del RGPD, basado en nuestro inters legtimo en analizar los errores de la aplicacin para solucionarlos y mejorarla, as como en analizar el uso de la aplicacin de forma seudnima con el fin de mejorar la aplicacin y nuestras ofertas.

2.2.3 Adjust
